Title: Simple but Cool Silverlight Message Boxes (Info, Error, Confirm, etc.)
Description:
Simple but presentable message boxes for Silverlight developers. 

Designed for ease of integration with existing projects.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Simple but presentable message boxes for Silverlight developers.

Designed for ease of integration with existing projects.

Features

  • Free for you to use and have fun!
  • Easy to get started and extend.
  • Message types include Info, Error, Confirm, Text Input, and Combo Input.
  • Icons are provided.
  • Well structured and commented code.

Please see Example Code for more details about utilizing the messages in your project.

Live demo available at Microsoft Expression Community.

Documentation on utilizing the library are available at the Wiki Pages.

For questions or comments, or customization requests, you may email me at khalzoro[at]yahoo[dot]com.
